tool_description: FloGrappling upcoming events, leatest new headlnes and list of all Flo Athletes
name: FloGrappling
title: FloGrappling

api_list.name: events by type
api_list.description: the three types are IBJJF, ADCC, WNO
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flograppling.p.rapidapi.com/events/ADCC"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flograppling.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://flograppling.p.rapidapi.com/events/{event_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flograppling.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
